title: Game is not letting me reconnect/load
body: Right now I am trying to play a game and the game starts and it doesn't even load up the game just keeps me stuck in the client telling me to reconnect which does nothing.

replies.body: It sounds like one of two things is most likely going wrong here. Either the game itself (not the client) doesn't have the right permissions settings to run correctly or the game hasn't been able to establish a solid link with the server you were going to be playing on. Let's first make sure your OS has the right permission and admin settings for League to run the way it needs to. Check out this [**permissions guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) for steps on how to get those setup properly, and let me know if that still doesn't help.

just tried all of that, also my internet is just fine I played on other computers over the same wi-fi no problems so I have opened up a support ticket with the hextech repair tool lol logs in it. And I highly doubt it is because of my wi-fi settings because I play other games no problem

Well......the [**permissions guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) doesn't actually have anything to do with wifi or internet. I'd suggest going through that guide step by step and letting me know which parts of it you're having issues with. Permissions and Connection and different and wifi settings won't help with permissions problems =\
